npgsql FirebirdSQL
SELECT AUD_TBL.ID AS ID, OUTC_CS, ACT_CS, TYP_CS, EVT_UTC, MNEMONIC FROM AUD_TBL INNER JOIN AUD_CD_TBL AS CLS_CD ON (CLS_CD.ID = CLS_CD_ID) INNER JOIN AUD_ACT_ASSOC_TBL ON (AUD_ACT_ASSOC_TBL.AUD_ID = AUD_TBL.ID AND AUD_ACT_ASSOC_TBL.IS_RQO) INNER JOIN AUD_ACT_TBL ON (AUD_ACT_ASSOC_TBL.ACT_ID = AUD_ACT_TBL.ID) WHERE AUD_TBL.EVT_UTC BETWEEN COALESCE(${from-date}, '0001-01-01') AND COALESCE(${to-date}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND LOWER(AUD_ACT_TBL.USR_NAME) = LOWER(${actor-id})

sqlite
SELECT AUD_TBL.ID AS ID, OUTC_CS, ACT_CS, TYP_CS, EVT_UTC, MNEMONIC from AUD_TBL INNER JOIN AUD_CD_TBL AS CLS_CD ON (CLS_CD.ID = CLS_CD_ID) INNER JOIN AUD_ACT_ASSOC_TBL ON (AUD_ACT_ASSOC_TBL.AUD_ID = AUD_TBL.ID AND AUD_ACT_ASSOC_TBL.IS_RQO) INNER JOIN AUD_ACT_TBL ON (AUD_ACT_ASSOC_TBL.ACT_ID = AUD_ACT_TBL.ID) WHERE EVT_UTC BETWEEN COALESCE(${from-date}, 0) AND COALESCE(${to-date}, 0xffffffffffff) AND LOWER(AUD_ACT_TBL.USR_NAME) = LOWER(${actor-id})
